basics.label: IT management
basics.summary: Detail-oriented professional with extensive Information Technology experience in hardware and software troubleshooting/management. With additional experience in networking, task automation, server technologies, digital graphic design, client + server side programming technologies and popular industry software packages including Microsoft Office and Adobe Creative Suite.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: In charge of planning, budgeting, and executing all IT projects. In addition to office troubleshooting, building/managing the company website and designing/updating the business's electronic newsletter.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Contracted IT consulting work from client computer repair to network expansion.
